text: Sphingomonas molluscorum is a Gram-negative, aerobic and non-motile bacteria from the genus of Sphingomonas which has been isolated from the mollusc Anadara broughtonii in the Peter the Great Bay in Russia.Deutsche Sammlung von Mikroorganismen und Zellkulturen == Further reading == * * == References == ==External links== *Type strain of Sphingomonas molluscorum at BacDive - the Bacterial Diversity Metadatabase molluscorum Category:Bacteria described in 2007
title: Sphingomonas molluscorum
